7. Global Oil Exporters – Angola is #7 Exporter

8. Angola Petro-Economy Problem: • An oil company can announce that they are investing $10 billion in an oil project in Angola but 90% of the money is spent outside (drill rigs in Korea, tankers in Japan, drill pipe made in USA, etc etc • For that reason it is very important for the government to foster industries in Angola like rigs fabrication, pipe welding facilities like Angloflex since it employs Angolans and is technology transfer
